text: what do you do if you have a romantic
partner you know someone you really love
and have trusted and you all of a sudden
find out this person's cheating on you
probably the most common reaction to
finding out about infidelity is anger
feel that emotion recognize that emotion
and also recognize that behind that
anger there are likely to be dozens of
different emotions burning underneath
resentment shame humiliation ambivalence
before you can ever try to rectify with
the other side if you even decide to you
need to internally take power of your
own emotional self that whole process
doesn't take 20 seconds that whole
process can take weeks months you know
for some a lifetime and if you look
deeply enough inside of you my senses
you will find the answer to what you can
do some people say there is no way i can
live with him or her again that's what
your emotions might say and continue to
say over time for others it might be I
despise you right now but I cannot hide
from the fact that I still feel a
connection with you and I want to live
my life with you and if that's the case
if you do talk instead of walk you might
want to move towards sharing some of
those deeper emotions with the other
person in a way that all helps you to
Cathar to get it out but that is
ultimately beneficial to your
relationship if you want to move forward
